articles.title: NASA assigns 2 astronauts to SpaceX Crew-4 mission to ISS - The Siasat Daily
articles.description:
1. NASA assigns 2 astronauts to SpaceX Crew-4 mission to ISS  The Siasat Daily
  2. Meet Kjell Lindgren, Bob Hines, selected for Nasas SpaceX Crew-4 mission  Hindustan Times
